Html:
I just downloaded this engine and was greatly amazed by the lighting system and how it has colors. However, I was wondering why some of the lights do not go away when you break them. When I break the flowers that cause light, then only thing that happens is the other flowers change color and the light from the flower you broke does not go away.

I was wondering if this is a bug or if I managed to break something while rummaging through the code.

I have the most "recent" download of New Take, from April 2012.
